name: Ruru's Christmas Run
description:
Ruru's Christmas Run is a Casual endless runner score attack game where you control a reindeer trying to collect baubles for Christmas. Designed for mobiles the game only requires one button to control and is avialable for android on google play.

Controls and instructions

click the screen or use space bar to jump

Avoid the red and white sweet blocks and collect the baubles to increase your score.

unlock a new skin every 500 baubles collected (accumulative)

play as a reindeer who can wear a rainbow Mohawk... once you unlock it. seriously a rainbow Mohawk... am i cool yet? no. ok...

  • Features:
  • Unlockable skins
  • One button controls
  • Sweet pixel art
  • Neat sound track
  • Local High Scores
